temples.name: Birmingham Alabama Temple

1927 Mount Olive Blvd
Gardendale AL 35071
United States
temples.services:
No clothing rental available
No cafeteria available
No patron housing available
No distribution center nearby
temples.ordinance_information: Ordinances for family names must be done in proper sequence—baptism, confirmation, Melchizedek Priesthood ordination (males), initiatory, endowment, and then sealing. Please allow sufficient time to perform all the ordinances you wish to complete during your visit. For additional help and information, please call the temple.
